channel.title: uhoh on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in uhoh on Barefoot Rob

item.title: small tsunami near fukushima
item.description: 09:44 Tuesday 22 November 2016 JST We had a small earthquake at 6am. According to JMA quake website it was near Fukushima. My students this morning said there was a tsunami 1 meter tall. Trains around Tokyo were snarled for a bit, but I arrived on time because I usually pad my commute for such problems. This morning’s lesson was in Akabanebashi, a lesson I usually teach on Mondays. Now I’m in Akihabara eating breakfast across Beck’s Coffee Shop, and AKB48 Cafe and Shop, one of which is not yet open for the day.
